channel.title: Problems with dark video
channel.description:
Hi everyone! For the timebeing everything is working great and I am fully enjoying the experience. But I have come to notice that the game, after few seconds, gets really dark. It starts well and clear and then in a matter of few moments it goes sooooo dark I cant no see much and really affects my ability to see my surroundings. Any ideas?
Many thanks
Shanhan

item.title: Problems with dark video
item.dc:creator: elivance
item.description:
Possible solutions

1- Black mesa is darker than HL1&2, so feel free to use always the flashlight.

2- You can adjust the brightness in Options->Video->Adjust brightness levelâ€¦

3- If you have a CRT monitor (unlikely), it means that is aging and you should change it.

4-You can modify he brightness of your monitor, You should have some buttons that allow you to do it.

Have fun!
